item.description:
This event is being put on by the National Heritage Center for Constitutional Studies.

"Walk through each amendment to the Bill of Rights to understand their meaning and get to the root of the concern they were intended to address. This course is open to all age groups and particularly appropriate to those wishing to be reconnected to the origins of the Framers' Constitutional Republic."

Registration closes: April 21, 2008
Seating is limited!
Admission is $45 which includes lunch.
Event runs from 8:30am - 4:30pm

Please check the NHCCS website for further details.
item.name: Origins of... The American Bill of Rights!
